description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Dual Stick, physics based sphere collision action. Move Left/Right with one stick while you rotate the camera and move in/out with the other. Collide similar colored spheres together to clear the levels.
description.short: Dual Stick, physics based sphere collision action. Move Left/Right with one stick while you rotate the camera and move in/out with the other. Collide similar colored spheres together to clear the levels.
